description:
The Swiss Army Knife of PC Gaming

Lovingly referred to as the Swiss Army Knife of PC gaming, Special K does a bit of everything. It is best known for fixing and enhancing graphics, its many detailed performance analysis and correction mods, and a constantly growing palette of tools that solve a wide variety of issues affecting PC games.
Below are the highlights between v 24.10.23.2 - v 24.10.24:

 + Fix NVIDIA's Vulkan interop not being detected on SDR systems in newest driver releases.
 + Add support for 8-bpc Render/Compute HDR remastering in Shadow Generations.
 + Add D3D11/DXGI Debug Layer minimum severity level to message logging UI.
 + Add anti-cheat workaround for Genshin Impact.
